Supporter $25/Month
Sign up
to become a Supporter!
Monthly Friends of Heartwood newsletter
Exclusive member events and happy hours
Free birthday ticket and drink voucher
Opportunities to share feedback and help choose artists
Superfan $50/Month
Sign up
to become a Superfan!
All Supporter perks plus:
$1 off drinks at the bar
Exclusive early ticket buying
SMS text alerts for tickets releases, giveaways and more
Exclusive access to our video archives
Legend $100/Month
Sign up
to become a Legend!
All Superfan perks plus:
Your name on our donor recognition wall
Free first drink at every show
Behind-the-scenes access at select shows
Exclusive annual Heartwood Legends Thank You Dinner
FAQ:
How do I sign up?
Choose one of the supporter types or email tyger@heartwoodsoundstage.com to learn more!
Can I buy a Friends of Heartwood membership as a gift for someone else?
Absolutely!
What are the exclusive member events?
Exclusive member events include an annual Friends of Heartwood open house. Superfan and Legend memberships include an annual donorâs celebration gala.
How do I pick up my Superfan or Legend credential?
You can pick up your credential by appointment with Tyger. Bring your credential when you visit Heartwood to receive your membership perks!

About Heartwood Soundstage
Heartwood Soundstage is a state-of-the-art music venue & production studio in Gainesville, Florida.
Heartwood is the product of the collective vision of founders Bob McPeek, Dave Melosh, Hoch Shitama, and Paul Pavelka. It is also the marriage of two recording studios, Mirror Image and Medusa, that played pivotal roles in the Gainesville music scene for forty years. Bob and Paul founded Mirror Image Recording Studios in 1977. Medusa was begun by Dave Melosh, originally as an audio production facility, but branching into video production soon thereafter. Built on the site of Mirror Image (and expanded into neighboring properties), Heartwood is the seventhâand by far the most ambitiousâiteration of the original 1977 studio.
